entry.title: Installation of Scanpy on a Mac M1

link.title: Installation of Scanpy on a Mac M1

entry.summary: Here a short article to provide some reminders about how to install Scanpy on your Mac M1. For managing my environments I use poetry, conda or pipenv. Unfortunately I did not manage to install Scanpy via pip depedent package managers (both pipenv or poetry do not work). The only alternative that worked wasconda. But to be operational, you first need to install and configure some dependencies.
